TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HttpWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class HttpWebResponse Inherits WebResponse Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class HttpWebResponse : System::Net::WebResponse, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type HttpWebResponse = class inherit WebResponse interface ISerializable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 類別的 HTTP 特定實作。

span.span: Provides an HTTP-specific implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含支援的屬性和方法會使用的 HTTP 特定類別。This class contains support for HTTP-specific uses of the properties and methods of the class. 類別用來建置 HTTP 獨立用戶端應用程式傳送 HTTP 要求和接收 HTTP 回應。The class is used to build HTTP stand-alone client applications that send HTTP requests and receive HTTP responses. > [!NOTE] > 請勿混淆與類別，用在 ASP.NET 應用程式，並透過 ASP 公開其方法和屬性。NET 的內建`Response`物件。Do not confuse with the class that is used in ASP.NET applications and whose methods and properties are exposed through ASP.NET's intrinsic `Response` object. 您應該永遠不會直接建立的執行個體類別。You should never directly create an instance of the class. 相反地，使用呼叫所傳回的執行個體。Instead, use the instance returned by a call to . 您必須呼叫或方法關閉回應，並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call either the or the method to close the response and release the connection for reuse. 您不需要呼叫和，但這麼做因此不會造成錯誤。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 傳回自網際網路資源的常見標頭資訊會公開為類別的屬性。Common header information returned from the Internet resource is exposed as properties of the class. 請參閱下表中的完整清單。See the following table for a complete list. 可讀取其他標頭屬性當做名稱/值組。Other headers can be read from the property as name/value pairs. 下表顯示一般的 HTTP 標頭，可透過內容類別。The following table shows the common HTTP headers that are available through properties of the class. |頁首Header|屬性Property| |------------|--------------| |內容編碼方式Content-Encoding|| |內容長度Content-Length|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |上次修改Last-Modified|| |伺服器Server|| 從網際網路資源回應的內容會以傳回藉由呼叫方法。The contents of the response from the Internet resource are returned as a by calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會傳回從。The following example returns an from an . [!code-cpp[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得回應的字元集。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含值，描述回應的字元集。The property contains a value that describes the character set of the response. 這項字元集資訊是取自傳回回應之標頭。This character set information is taken from the header returned with the response. ## Examples 下列範例會取得回應的字元集。The following example obtains the character set of the response. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉回應資料流。

span.span: Closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法關閉回應資料流，並釋放以供重複使用資源的連線，其他要求。The method closes the response stream and releases the connection to the resource for reuse by other requests. 您不應該存取的任何屬性物件在呼叫之後`Close`方法。You should not access any properties of the object after the call to the `Close` method. 在.NET Core 上就會擲回。On .NET Core, an is thrown. 您必須呼叫或方法來關閉資料流並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call either the or the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 您不需要呼叫和，但這麼做因此不會造成錯誤。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 若要關閉資料流的失敗可能會導致您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to close the stream can cause your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何關閉。The following example demonstrates how to close a . [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/CPP/httpwebresponse_close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/CS/httpwebresponse_close.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/VB/httpwebresponse_close.vb#1)]

exception.span: **僅限 .NET Core：** 此 物件已被處置。

span.span: **.NET Core only:** This object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源； 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 取得用來從伺服器讀取回應主體的資料流。

span.span: Gets the stream that is used to read the body of the response from the server.
A containing the body of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從要求的網際網路資源傳回的資料流。The method returns the data stream from the requested Internet resource. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫或方法來關閉資料流並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call either the or the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 您不需要呼叫和，但這麼做因此不會造成錯誤。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 若要關閉資料流的失敗會導致您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to close the stream will cause your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用傳回用來讀取伺服器回應的執行個體。The following example demonstrates how to use to return the instance used to read the response from the server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/CPP/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/CS/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/VB/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得最近修改回應內容的日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the last date and time that the contents of the response were modified.

value.span: ，包含修改回應內容的日期和時間。

span.span: A that contains the date and time that the contents of the response were modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含接收與回應 Last-modified 標頭的值。The property contains the value of the Last-Modified header received with the response. 日期和時間假設為本地時間。The date and time are assumed to be local time. ## Examples 這個範例會建立和回應的查詢。This example creates an and queries for a response. 此範例接著會檢查要求的實體是否已修改任何在今天的時間。This example then checks whether the entity requested had been modified any time today. summary.span: 取得用來傳回回應的方法。

span.span: Gets the method that is used to return the response.

value.span: 字串，含有用來傳回回應的 HTTP 方法。

span.span: A string that contains the HTTP method that is used to return the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回用來傳回回應的方法。 returns the method that is used to return the response. 常見的 HTTP 方法是 GET、 HEAD、 POST、 PUT 和 DELETE。Common HTTP methods are GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, and DELETE. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查中所包含的字串，以決定叫用之 Web 伺服器的 Http 方法。The following example checks the string contained in , to determine the Http method invoked by the Web server. MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ResponseUri As Uri
public: virtual property Uri ^ ResponseUri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得回應要求之網際網路資源的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI of the Internet resource that responded to the request.

value.span: 回應要求的網際網路資源 URI。

span.span: The URI of the Internet resource that responded to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含對要求實際回應的網際網路資源的 URI。The property contains the URI of the Internet resource that actually responded to the request. 此 URI 可能不相同的原始要求的 URI，如果原始伺服器將要求重新導向。This URI might not be the same as the originally requested URI, if the original server redirected the request. 屬性會使用 Content-location 標頭，如果有的話。The property will use the Content-Location header if present. 應用程式需要存取最後一個重新導向應該使用屬性而非，因為使用屬性可能會開啟安全性弱點。Applications that need to access the last redirected should use the property rather than , since the use of property may open security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 這個範例會建立查詢，然後檢查原始 URI 已重新導向伺服器。This example creates a and queries for an and then checks to see whether the original URI was redirected by the server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/CPP/httpwebresponse_responseuri.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/CS/httpwebresponse_responseuri.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/VB/httpwebresponse_responseuri.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
